page.title: 08My Patchway
page.content: The Patchway we live in now is boring. They want to build houses everywhere there is a space. People are signing a petition to get an adventure playground instead of houses. I'd like a Sports Centre where the woods are. The only good place we have is the BMX track where they have racing. BMX's are bicycles used only for off the road use. They have a park called "Scott Park". It used to be good until some vandals got there In the park they used to have a big slider and a witch's hat and it spins round. They have taken it away now. We would all go to the Sports Centre if we had one. We have to go a long way to go to somewhere good.
